item.title: Double Wrapped Grogs
item.description: Double Wrapped Grog Splices A double wrapped 5mm grog connection made and photographed by Clayton Underwood. Double wrapped grogs are a very strong connector.

item.title: Factors Influencing Choice of Split Connections
item.description: Factors Influencing Choice of Split Connections There are many ways of making split connections on highlines, with no single method clearly considered “best” by the community.

item.title: Grog Splice Full Break Tests
item.description: Complete Grog Breaktests Main Test These are the unedited values for the 20 breaktests of grog splices completed in June 2022.

item.title: Grog Splices
item.description: Grog Splices Grog splices are a new method of connecting split highlines, but have already gained fans for being the lowest volume split connector.

item.title: Splicing Grogs On Site
item.description: Splicing Grogs on Site In my original post about grog splices, I said it took about 10 minutes to splice a full connection in the field.
